metadata.description: AI prompt skills for analysis, writing, fact-checking, editing, and interviewing. Methodology-driven prompts with 12 analysis frameworks, 6 writing methodologies, and systematic verification workflows. English version.

plugins.name: newtype-skills-english
plugins.description: Collection of methodology-driven AI prompt skills including Super Analyst (12 analysis frameworks), Super Writer (6 writing methodologies), Super Fact-Checker (systematic verification), Super Editor (4-layer editing), Super Interviewer (Socratic dialogue techniques), Dual-Model Analyze (GPT-5.2 + Gemini 3 Pro parallel analysis), Meeting Digest (transcript processor), and Project Sync Pack (visual deliverables generator). All skills are in English.
